name: 暮雨流花
description:
What is happiness?

Happiness is the sea, the wind, the rainstorm -- and the eternal love

Liu Haoran, a repeating student who was deeply trapped in fate, met the class monitor who was also trapped in fate in the new school

What will the twists and turns between the two ultimately lead to?

"Perhaps I can also live a peaceful and happy life like an ordinary person."

Stay tuned, the exciting story of the evening rain and flowing flowers

What is the game about?


Answer: Don't be nervous, the theme has almost nothing to do with repeating, so rest assured

The only theme of the Twilight series is loneliness. If you like the feeling of being alone in the house in the rainstorm, and if you like standing alone on the balcony in the evening blowing the wind at the junction of summer and autumn, please try this work

The content of this work is about a young girl who is trapped in loneliness and the efforts and results she makes in the face of this loneliness. It is a journey of loneliness where laughter and coldness coexist
